title: Ukrainian drones strike deep inside Russia, targeting key missile factory
Russia Attacks Ukraine Ahead of Invasionâ€™s 4th Anniversary
text: At least one man was killed in Kyiv as Moscow launched a wave of drones and missiles, days after the latest round of U.S.-mediated talks to end the war.

title: At Least 10 Killed in Lebanon, Officials Say, After Israel Strikes Hezbollah
text: The Lebanese militant group said eight of its members were among those killed late Friday. The attacks threaten to further destabilize an already tenuous cease-fire.
